data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liang, Ai-Ping, Song, Zhi-Shun, Jiang, Guo-Mei (2006): Sphenocratus xinjiangensis Liang, sp. nov., the first authentic record of the dictyopharid subfamily Orgeriinae (Hemiptera: Fulgoroidea: Dictyopharidae) in China. Zootaxa 1296: 55-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173544
